com.emc.vipr.client

Class Tasks<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.vipr.client.Tasks<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - Type of the underlying resource running the operation.

    public class Tasks<R>
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of multiple asynchronous tasks returned from an operation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tasks(RestClient client, java.util.List<TaskResourceRep> tasks, java.lang.Class<R> resourceClass)

    • Method Detail

      • getTasks

        public java.util.List<Task<R>> getTasks()
        Retrieves all tasks associated with the operation.
        Returns:
        List of tasks.

      • firstTask

        public Task<R> firstTask()
        Retrieves the first task in the list.
        Returns:
        The first task or null if there are no tasks in the list.

      • latestFinishedTask

        public Task<R> latestFinishedTask()
        Retrieves the latest task in the list that has finished processing.
        Returns:
        The latest task or null if there are no tasks in the list.

      • waitFor

        public Tasks<R> waitFor()
                 throws ViPRException
        Waits for tasks to complete (go into a pending or error state). If an error occurs it will be thrown as an exception.
        Returns:
        This tasks.
        Throws:
        ViPRException - Thrown if any task is in an error state.

      • waitFor

        public Tasks<R> waitFor(long timeoutMillis)
                 throws ViPRException
        Waits for tasks to complete (go into a pending or error state). If an error occurs it will be thrown as an exception.
        Parameters:
        timeoutMillis - Timeout after a number of milliseconds
        Returns:
        This tasks.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - Thrown if a timeout occurs.
        ViPRException - Thrown if any task is in an error state.

      • get

        public java.util.List<R> get()
        Waits for tasks to complete (go into a pending or error state). If an error occurs it will be thrown as an exception. If any task was successful this returns the actual object for the underlying resource.
        Returns:
        List of resource objects.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - Thrown if a timeout occurs.
        ViPRException - Thrown if any task is in an error state.

      • get

        public java.util.List<R> get(long timeoutMillis)
        Waits for tasks to complete (go into a pending or error state). If an error occurs it will be thrown as an exception. If any task was successful this returns the actual object for the underlying resource.
        Parameters:
        timeoutMillis - Timeout after a number of milliseconds
        Returns:
        List of resource objects.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - Thrown if a timeout occurs.
        ViPRException - Thrown if any task is in an error state.
